https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sRPjFf4lrbRXP9lJRVl023fJeqH.jpg Follow the adventures of Sgt. Elke Mantooth, Lt. Drucilla Dread and The BMP Task Force as they seek out the worst "cine-terrorists" in movie history and bring their crimes to justice for your entertainment! The first BAD MOVIE POLICE case is a little gem from 1992 called GALAXY OF THE DINOSAURS. Bad Movie Police: Case #1: Galaxy Of The Dinosaurs
